casebody.data:
STATE
v.
SLOAN AND WOOTEN. No. 24A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2007. Nora Henry Hargrove, for Sloan. Norman Young, Jr., Thomas Meacham, Jr., Assistant Attorney Generals, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of March 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Wooten) shall have up to and including the 16th day of April 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of March 2007."
